Literature.Title: Activity and Predicted Nephrotoxicity of Synthetic Antibiotics Based on Polymyxin B
Literature.Author: Gallardo-Godoy A, Muldoon C, Becker B, Elliott AG, Lash LH, Huang JX, Butler MS, Pelingon R, Kavanagh AM, Ramu S, Phetsang W, Blaskovich MA, Cooper MA

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-2146(MIC=4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=1µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>32µg/ml),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(50-60% Cytotoxicity=>300µM)
